oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: B. P. Barnes correspondence with J. F. Brizzie, 1928 September 27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter of recommendation to a representative at American Railway Express Company regarding Edna E. Knight, a former employee of the Dixie Mercerizing Company located in Chattanooga, Tennessee.
